general.name: Alias eyeWv
general.shortDesc: Allows to call a function of the eyeWv library. This alias, and the library, has been deleted in the following releases of eyeOS 1.2 in favor of the eyeConverter library.

trace.desc: Deleted. This library is deprecated and it is recommended not to use it.

definition.desc: Allows to call a function of the eyeWv library.

params.name: call
params.desc: Name of the function of the eyeWv library to call.

params.name: args
params.desc: Array containing the arguments that will be passed to the function. Whether the arguments are expressed as an indexed or associative array depends on the own function's syntax.

definition.return: The value returned by the eyeWv function.
